name: The V& System
description:
The V& Engine is a system meant to give Players the power of Success and Failure. 

This allows the GM and Players to craft a story together. 

The direction of the story is made with intentional choices and not by chance.

Fill up your "tank" and ride off with your party spending resources to overcome challenges and obstacles! Be careful not to use them all up and Overheat!

A dice less system that can be used to play any genre or world of game to allow your Players and GM maximum control over the Success and Failure of the narrative.
